document.full_text: major banks are willing to pay as much as $5 billion to settle claims by federal and state officials of improper mortgage foreclosure practices, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the situation.
document.title: banks float $5 billion deal to settle foreclosure probe: report
lines_and_colors: major banks are willing to pay as much as $5 billion to settle claims by federal and state officials of improper mortgage foreclosure practices, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the situation.
